parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.18

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> System

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns value of the given stat.<br>
A list of possible StatNames can be found here: [[Arma 3 Stat Names]]

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[getStatValue]] name

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> name: [[String]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] (can return [[Nothing]])
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[getStatValue]] "ExpWarlockDown"; <template><title>cc</title><part><name index="1"/><value>Checks if the "Warlock Down" Achivement was already aquired</value></part></template></code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[setStatValue]], [[Arma 3 Stat Names]]
</value></part></template></root>
